abstract.p: Martina Navratilova and Arantxa Sanchez-Vicario defeat Jennifer Capriati and Anna Kournikova in second round doubles match at US Open tennis tournament (S)

block.p: With Arantxa Sanchez-Vicario by her side, 43-year-old Martina Navratilova was putting away the young tandem of Jennifer Capriati and Anna Kournikova last night when she realized her skills have not left her, just her memory.

With Arantxa Sanchez-Vicario by her side, 43-year-old Martina Navratilova was putting away the young tandem of Jennifer Capriati and Anna Kournikova last night when she realized her skills have not left her, just her memory.

Down by 0-30 on her serve in the fourth game of the second set, Navratilova discovered why the ball suddenly looked so blurry. During the changeover, just after taking a 3-0 lead, Navratilova stuck her glasses in her duffel bag.
A little embarrassed, Navratilova walked over to her chair and grabbed the glasses for her next serve. A sympathetic crowd gave her an ovation as she laughed and shrugged.

Navratilova quickly recovered, and she and Sanchez-Vicario ran off four straight points to take the game. They then won the second-round doubles match, 7-5, 6-0. The 19-year-old Kournikova and 24-year-old Capriati never stood a chance.
